sprache.aRecordMissing: A record for domain %domain% not configured to %ip%
sprache.error_password_not_set: FTP password not allowed, not set, or not repeated.
sprache.help_blocksize: Most filesystems are configured with a blocksize of 4096. This means one block contains 4096 Byte data.
sprache.help_default_dns: This (sub) domain can be entered at domains. In case it is removed at the domain management, this default one is deactivated.
sprache.help_fdl_attention: Warning! Recommended method is to create a subfolder for each game. Naming could be like cod4, cstrike, css, etc.
sprache.help_fdl_hl: Half-Life 1 (CS 1.6, TFC, DOD, etc.) and Half-Life 2 (CSS, CSGO, DODS, L4D2, TF2, etc.) based servers need entries like this at the server.cfg
sprache.help_fdl_ut: UnrealEngine based servers (UT GOTY, UT2004) need entries like this at the server.ini
sprache.help_fdl_cod: Call of Duty Server require eintries like this at the server.cfg
sprache.help_inode_block_ratio: Most systems have a ratio of 4. This means 4 blocks have one inode.
sprache.help_web_master: Warning, we recommend to use the host for fast download only. Other panels and software can cause issues or can be affected by the fastdownload. Typical fastdownload behaviour is to create traffic and load spikes which will create lags on other server deamons.
sprache.pathCorrected: Path belonging to domain %domain% corrected from %pathGiven% to %pathConverted%
sprache.quotaWarning: Warning! Whithout Quotas user can upload data until the disk is full!
